GK16jaycndpu:392: muñca mānaṃ dinaṃ prāptaṃ manda nandī harāntike // JCand_5.110 //
GK16jaycndpu:398: tvaṃ vasan hṛdaye tasyāḥ sākṣāt pañceṣur īkṣyase // JCand_5.113 //
GK16jaycndpu:400: sānau yasyābhavad yuddhaṃ tad dhūrjaṭikirīṭinoḥ // JCand_5.114 //
GK16jaycndpu:402: tvayi dātari rājendra yācakāḥ kalpaśākhinaḥ // JCand_5.115 //
GK16jaycndpu:406: alaṅkārān imān sapta kecid āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // JCand_5.117 //
GK16jaycndpu:408: eteṣām eva vinyāsān nālaṅkārāntarāṇy amī // JCand_5.118 //
GK16jaycndpu:410: upādhiḥ kvacid udbhinnaḥ syād anyatrāpi saṃbhavāt // JCand_5.119 //
GK16jaycndpu:412: manuṣye bhavataḥ kvāpi hy alaṅkārāṅgatāṃ gate // JCand_5.120 //
GK16jaycndpu:416: prāyeṇāmī hy alaṃkārā bhinnā nātiśayoktitaḥ // JCand_5.122 //
GK16jaycndpu:420: tad arvācīnabhedeṣu nāmnāṃ nāmnāya iṣyatām // JCand_5.124 //
GK16jaycndpu:421: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:422: caturthaḥ saikoyam sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mayūkhaḥ sumanasaḥ // ālambanoddīpanātmā vibhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ dvidhā /
GK16jaycndpu:423: kāryo 'nubhāvo bhāvaś ca sahāyo vyabhicāry api // JCand_6.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:426: kāvye nāṭye ca kārye ca vibhāvādyair vibhāvitaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:427: āsvādyamānaikatanuḥ sthāyī bhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ // JCand_6.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:431: sambhogo vipralambhaś ca śṛṅgāro dvividho mataḥ // JCand_6.5 //
GK16jaycndpu:435: vibhāvādyair yutaḥ śoka-sthāyī syāt karuṇo rasaḥ // JCand_6.7 //
GK16jaycndpu:441: bhāvair mohādibhir yukto bhayasthāyī bhayānakaḥ // JCand_6.10 //
GK16jaycndpu:451: ālasyaṃ caiva dainyaṃ ca cintā mohaḥ smṛtir dhṛtiḥ // JCand_6.15 //
GK16jaycndpu:452: vrīḍā capalatā harṣa āvego jaḍatā tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:453: garvo viṣāda autsukyaṃ nidrāpasmāra eva ca // JCand_6.16 //
GK16jaycndpu:455: matir vyādhis tathonmādas tathā maraṇam eva ca // JCand_6.17 //
GK16jaycndpu:456: trāsaś caiva vitarkaś ca vijñeyā vyabhicāriṇaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:457: trayastriṃśad ime bhāvāḥ samākhyātās tu nāmataḥ // JCand_6.18 //
GK16jaycndpu:459: anaucityā rasābhāsā bhāvābhāsāś ca kīrtitāḥ // JCand_6.19 //
GK16jaycndpu:460: bhāvasya śāntir udayaḥ sandhiḥ śabalatā tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:463: samāsaḥ syāt padair na syāt samāsaḥ sarvathāpi ca // JCand_6.21 //
GK16jaycndpu:464: pāñcālikī ca lāṭīyā gauḍīyā ca yathārasam /
GK16jaycndpu:465: vaidarbhī ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ catasro rītayaḥ smṛtāḥ // JCand_6.22 //
GK16jaycndpu:467: lakāraś ca lasaṃyukto hrasvavyavahitau raṇau // JCand_6.23 //
GK16jaycndpu:469: kapākrāntas tavargaḥ syāt prauḍhāyāṃ ca kamūrdhatā // JCand_6.24 //
GK16jaycndpu:470: sarvair ūrdhvaiḥ sakārasya sarvai rephasya sarvathā /
GK16jaycndpu:471: rahor dvedhā tu saṃyogaḥ paruṣāyāṃ śaṣau svataḥ // JCand_6.25 //
GK16jaycndpu:473: lalitāyāṃ tathā śeṣā bhadrāyām iti vṛttayaḥ // JCand_6.26 //
GK16jaycndpu:477: lalanā rabhasaṃ dhatte ghanāṭope mahīyasi // JCand_6.28 //
GK16jaycndpu:478: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:479: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mahati ṛtusaṃkhyaḥ // JCand_6.29
GK16jaycndpu:481: bhāratī bhāti gambhīrā kuṭilā saralā kvacit // JCand_7.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:483: kaṭākṣa iva lolākṣyā vyāpāro vyañjanātmakaḥ // JCand_7.2 //
GK16jaycndpu:484: avivakṣitavācyasya dvau bhedau vācyam eva cet /
GK16jaycndpu:485: arthāntire saṃkramitam atyantaṃ vā tiraskṛtam // JCand_7.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:487: catvāriṃśadyutaikena bhedāḥ ṣaṭ cānayoḥ kramāt // JCand_7.4 //
GK16jaycndpu:491: arthaśaktisamutthasya bhedā dvādaśa tad yathā // JCand_7.6 //
GK16jaycndpu:492: catvāro vastv alaṃkāram alaṃkāras tu vastu yat /
GK16jaycndpu:493: alaṃkāram alaṃkāro vastu vastu vyanakti tat // JCand_7.7 //
GK16jaycndpu:495: svasiddho vā vyañjako 'rthaś catvāras triguṇās tataḥ // JCand_7.8 //
GK16jaycndpu:500: ye ṣoḍaśādyā dviguṇās te syur vākyapadāśrayāt /
GK16jaycndpu:501: prabandhe 'pi dvādaśa syur arthaśaktibhuvo bhidaḥ // JCand_7.11 //
GK16jaycndpu:503: bhedāḥ syur ekapañcāśat saṃbhinnās tu sahasraśaḥ // JCand_7.12 //
GK16jaycndpu:505: svāṅkuritam atadrūpaṃ svayam ullasitaṃ giraḥ // JCand_7.13 //
GK16jaycndpu:507: kaścit taṭasthaḥ kaścic ca bodhitapratibodhitaḥ // JCand_7.14 //
GK16jaycndpu:509: upekṣānihnavābhyāṃ ca dvidhā svāṅkuritaṃ matam // JCand_7.15 //
GK16jaycndpu:513: arthe 'rtham anyaṃ yaṃ vakti tad vācyavyaṅgyam iṣyate // JCand_7.17 //
GK16jaycndpu:514: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:515: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke sukhayatu mahati munisaṃkhyaḥ // yad vyajyamānaṃ manasaḥ staimityāya sa no dhvaniḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:516: anyathā tu guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyam āpatitaṃ tridhā // JCand_8.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:517: vyaktir eva kvacid vyaṅgyaḥ kvacid arthasvabhāvataḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:518: kvacic cārutarasyāgre sa vimuñcati cārutām // JCand_8.2 //
GK16jaycndpu:520: vismṛtaḥ kim apāṃnātha sa tvayā kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ // JCand_8.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:522: hā hā! matkucakāśmīra-liptaṃ bhinnam uraḥ śaraiḥ // JCand_8.4 //
GK16jaycndpu:523: tathā vācyasya siddhyaṅgaṃ naur artho vāridher yathā /
GK16jaycndpu:524: saṃśritya taraṇiṃ dhīrās taranti vyādhivāridhīn // JCand_8.5 //
GK16jaycndpu:526: kuṅkumāktaṃ stanadvandvaṃ mānasaṃ mama gāhate // JCand_8.6 //
GK16jaycndpu:530: kānte tvadānanarucā glānim eti saroruham // JCand_8.8 //
GK16jaycndpu:531: asundaraṃ yadi vyaṅgyaṃ syād vācyād amanoharam /
GK16jaycndpu:534: ity aṣṭadhā guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyam aṅgīkṛtaṃ budhaiḥ // JCand_8.10 //
GK16jaycndpu:535: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:536: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke mahati vasusaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu // mukhyārthasyāvivakṣāyāṃ pūrvārvācī ca rūḍhitaḥ /
GK16jaycndpu:537: prayojanāc ca saṃbaddhaṃ vadantī lakṣaṇā matā // JCand_9.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:541: viduḥ sphuṭaṃ taṭasthatvād arthagatvād dvidhā budhāḥ // JCand_9.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:545: asphuṭatvaṃ taṭasthatvaṃ lakṣyasthatvam amuṣya ca // JCand_9.5 //
GK16jaycndpu:546: anyās tisra iti vyaktā śaktitaḥ sā caturvidhā /
GK16jaycndpu:547: indur evaiṣa tadvaktram utkarṣo lakṣyate mukhe // JCand_9.6 //
GK16jaycndpu:549: paṭo 'yaṃ dagdha ityādau sphuṭaṃ nāsti prayojanam // JCand_9.7 //
GK16jaycndpu:556: gauṇaṃ sāropam uddiṣṭam indur mukham itīdṛśam /
GK16jaycndpu:557: gauṇaṃ sādhyavasānaṃ syād indur evedam īdṛśam // JCand_9.11 //
GK16jaycndpu:558: śuddhaṃ sāropam uddiṣṭam āyur ghṛtam itīdṛśam /
GK16jaycndpu:559: śuddhaṃ sādhyavasānaṃ syād āyur evedam īdṛśam // JCand_9.12 //
GK16jaycndpu:561: kuntā viśanti gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣo nivasatīti ca // JCand_9.13 //
GK16jaycndpu:563: sarasaṃ kāvyam amṛtaṃ vidyā sthirataraṃ dhanam // JCand_9.14 //
GK16jaycndpu:565: saundaryeṇaiṣa kandarpaḥ sā ca mūrtimatī ratiḥ // JCand_9.15 //
GK16jaycndpu:566: śabde padārthe vākyārthe saṃkhyāyāṃ kārake tathā /
GK16jaycndpu:568: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
GK16jaycndpu:569: mayūkhastenāsau sukavijayadevena racite ciraṃ candrāloke mahati navasaṃkhyaḥ sukhayatu // dharmaṃ kaṃcit puraskṛtya prāyaḥ śabdaḥ pravartate /
GK16jaycndpu:570: yayārthaṃ spaṣṭam ācaṣṭe śabdas tām abhidhāṃ viduḥ // JCand_10.1 //
GK16jaycndpu:572: nirdeśena tathā prāhuḥ ṣaḍvidhām abhidhāṃ budhāḥ // JCand_10.2 //
GK16jaycndpu:573: gaur nīlaḥ pācako daṇḍī ḍitthaḥ kaṃsa iti kramāt /
GK16jaycndpu:574: kaṃ saṃhinasti kaṃsārir naraṃ ca kaṃ samāśritam // JCand_10.3 //
GK16jaycndpu:578: sudhānidhānam āsādya śrayadhvaṃ vibudhā mudam // JCand_10.5 //
GK16jaycndpu:581: mahādevaḥ satrapramukhamakhavidyaikacaturaḥ sumitrā tadbhaktipraṇihitamatir yasya pitarau
